== Tremulous ==

From the <nowiki>[[http://tremulous.net/about/|official About page]]</nowiki>   "Tremulous is a free, open source game that blends a team based FPS with elements of an RTS."

=== Installation ===

Tremulous is no longer available in the repositories.
You can try downloading it from <nowiki>[[http://tremulous.net/files/|their website]]</nowiki>.
